MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 and LL14 areas of Wrexham affecting properties in Bersham, Rhostyllen and surrounding area]. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 6:19am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken equipment on the overhead network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:27am on 12th February 2021..
